message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I've been doing some research and I found similar products in that price range. I'd be willing to buy the product from you for $100.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $100 is a fair price for other products, mine is truly unique and worth more. I'm willing to come down a bit to $110. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
